title: Instructional Design and Implementation Competency Enhancement Program for Online Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Online medical education design capability development program in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply foundational instructional design theories (e.g., Gagné’s Nine Events) to online medical education design
Learners can produce at least three microlearning contents (5-minute videos, quizzes) suitable for mobile environments
Learners design project-based assessments (e.g., virtual patient case analysis reports) and incorporate peer feedback

resources: Free Online Authoring Tools (e.g., Canva, Google Forms)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
